metadata.title: CVE-2025-0290 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.0 prior to 17.5.5, from 17.6 prior to 17.6.3, and from17.7 prior to 17.7.1. Under certain conditions, processing of CI artifactsmetadata could cause background jobs to become unresponsive.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
